sentences.en: The misunderstanding had caused a seven-year estrangement between them.
sentences.cn: 这场误会使得他们七年互不往来。

sentences.en: If the forces of law had not uncovered Stein in the seven-year interval that was their hard luck.
sentences.cn: 要是执法机关没有在那七年的期限里抓到斯坦，那只能算他们不幸了。

sentences.en: Sam is the seven-year-old son of Eric Davies.
sentences.cn: 萨姆是埃里克•戴维斯的7岁儿子。
